entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
